DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To investigate effectiveness online training program medical staff five public hospital locate Sichuan , Yunnan , Hubei , Fujian Provinces China , improve fire knowledge . Methods : Participants randomly divide control ( receive non-fire video training ) intervention ( receive hospital fire video train ) group . All participant complete questionnaire fire knowledge receive training . Hypothesis : If online training effective , promoted convenient effective use training promoted hospital .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness On-line Training Program Hospital Medical Staff Improve Fire Knowledge
